TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StringProperty extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Identifies the string properties of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.StringProperty> enumeration represents a set of string properties that describe visual style elements. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.StringProperty> values are used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetString%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to specify which property value to retrieve for the element that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> currently represents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.StringProperty Text = int32(3201)

Docs.summary: The text that will be displayed with the element.
